name: AudioVisual Book Data File
summary: Learn about .ABCD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: AudioVisual books are sometimes called the DVDs of the book publishing industry.

description: Digital book containing text, audio, and video data; stored in an encrypted XML format; can also save highlighting, bookmarks, and annotations added by the user; used in education, corporate communication, and general reading.
